name: The Data Science Blog
body:
### Denton's Data Science Blog.
This is the personal data science blog of Denton DeLoss. I am currently performing data science in academia but hope to transfer to industry where I can focus solely on the thing I loved most about graduate school and during my post-doctoral career, exploring and analyzing data using statistical and machine learning methods. I am currently looking for a position in industry as a data scientist. 

### What you'll find here
On this page I will share analyses that I have performed or that I am currently working on. This is a place for me to store and share my work with others and to grow as a data scientist.

### About Me
I received my PhD from the University of California, Riverside in cognitive psychology and recently completed the Insight Data Science program in Palo Alto, CA. I love the feeling of digging into a new data set, learning through exploration of data, and hopefully finding something novel. 

### Contact
If you'd like to contact me you can reach me at my [email address](denton.deloss@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
